docs.snippet: In addition to Martin Richard and Krystle Campbell, a female graduate student from China was identified as the third spectator killed in the marathon blasts....
docs.lead_paragraph: In addition to Martin Richard and Krystle Campbell, a female graduate student from China was identified as the third spectator killed in the marathon blasts.
docs.abstract: Female graduate student from China is identified as third spectator, along with 8-year-old Martin Richard and 29-year-old Krystle Campbell, killed in Boston Marathon bombings.

headline.main: Victims, Ages 8 and 29, Remembered for Kindness and Laughter
headline.print_headline: Victims, Ages 8 and 29, Remembered for Kindness and Laughter

byline.contributor: Kitty Bennett and Michael Roston contributed research.
byline.original: By BINYAMIN APPELBAUM and JOHN ELIGON
